email_template.name: community_product_approved
email_template.subject: Community Product Approved for data.gov.my
email_template.html_content:
Dear {{name}},

Your submission of the community product {{product_name}} has been approved for showcasing on https://data.gov.my. If it passes moderation checks (for spam, abuse, violence, etc.), it will be published on our Community Products page

If approved, you will be notified at this email. Alternatively, you may search for your entry on our Community Products page.

If the community product is rejected, no further notice will be given.

Thank you for contributing to our community showcase.

Warm regards,
data.gov.my data team

email_template.name: community_product_approved
email_template.subject: Lulusan Produk Komuniti untuk data.gov.my
email_template.html_content:
Tuan/Puan {{name}},

Penyerahan produk komuniti anda {{product_name}} telah diluluskan untuk dipamerkan di https://data.gov.my/ms-MY. Jika berjaya lulus ujian moderasi (untuk spam, penyalahgunaan, keganasan, dan sebagainya), ia akan diterbitkan di halaman Produk Komuniti kami.

Jika diluluskan, anda akan dimaklumkan melalui emel ini. Sebagai alternatif, anda boleh mencari entri anda di halaman Produk Komuniti kami.

Jika produk komuniti ditolak, tiada notis lanjut akan diberikan.

Terima kasih kerana menyumbang kepada pameran komuniti kami.

Harapan salam,
Pasukan data.gov.my
